name: Fortune Cookie
description: Crack open a virtual fortune cookie and reveal a piece of wisdom, humor, or surprise. One click, one fortune — no fluff, no distractions.

name: Qrly
description: A minimal web app that converts user-provided URLs into downloadable QR codes using a clean split-view layout.

name: Tagify
description: QR code generation and analytics platform with a full-stack setup to track scan performance over time.

name: Kailus
description: Scheduling assistant that uses natural language prompts and the OpenAI API to generate structured work schedules.

name: ROOP
description: Redesigned and rebuilt a restaurant website with improved visual clarity, modern UI, and interactive elements.

name: Weird Girl Ink
description: Custom website for a local tattoo studio, inspired by their social media presence and built for creative showcase.
